secondaries.shortDescription: End of round, score point based on how your ASPECT WARRIOR killed units this turn

subObjectives.description: one or more enemy units were destroyed by a ranged attack made by an ASPECT WARRIOR unit from your army this battle round.
one or more enemy units were destroyed by a melee attack made by a different ASPECT WARRIOR unit from your army this battle round.
You did both of the above

secondaries.shortDescription: ASURYANI PSYKER can attempt Scry Futures (Psychic Action - Warp Charge 4). Score 3 everytime a unit complete this action

subObjectives.description: A Unit completed the Scry Futures action

secondaries.shortDescription: ASURYANI units can attempt Scout the Enemy (End of movement phase up to next command phase)

subObjectives.description: the unit performing this action is not wholly within your opponent deployment zone.
the unit performing the action is wholly within your opponent deployment zone.
